Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is light-brown in colour, the fabric is pale-red and grey in section, the exterior is covered with a brown slip, now very worn, and very faint traces of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393885) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393885)
